Articles.Content:
So i wanted to make a crew transfer thing for my spacestation on my roleplaying site (link can be found in my signature)

And i thought, why not do it with style?

So well i started designing a rocket that could do that.

It's still in early prototype but here's some footage i took :

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=i8lEHPdYq_Q

I'm working on a couple of things, like how to get 100% of the fairing off and how to stop it from leaving pieces of debris in kerbin orbit.

But all in all it is pretty functional.

When this rocket is more finished i'll post it here!
